item.title: Footer Text
item.description: You may have noticed the small, centered text at the bottom of every page on this site. This is the site’s footer. It can be set by assigning a string of HTML to the FOOTER_HTML Pelican setting; if FOOTER_HTML is not set, no footer is shown.
